headline: AutoZone, Inc. (AZO): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on AutoZone, Inc. (AZO) on Substack by Francesco Ferrari. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on AZO. AutoZone, Inc. (AZO)’s share was trading at $3603.47 as of April 17th. AZO’s trailing and forward P/E were 24.20 and 23.36 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. AutoZone (AZO) stands out as […]
